skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: candy simply fi
des:
Enter a new world, manage your Candy appliances in an innovative and bespoke way. You can find the best program to use, send commands or ask for advice or technical support. 
To use the full features set of Candy you must have purchased a Candy's washing machine and have created an account using the Candy simply-Fi mobile app.

About this skill:
The skill might support basically all the features as available in the simply-Fi app. We are continuously working on new version releases to improve and enrich the skill experience. 
Be aware that as home appliances are not part of the Alexa Smart Home program, you’ll need to use ‘Candy simply fi” as an invocation name to launch the skill. It means “Alexa tell Candy simply fi …” or “Alexa ask Candy simply fi…”

To get started:
Register your smart appliances using the simply-Fi app on your iOS or Android device.
If you’re not familiar with the skill, simply start off by saying: 
‘Alexa, ask Candy simply fi to what can I ask you? or ‘Alexa, tell Candy simply fi to start cycle wool’


You can do various things like:
Manage the washing machine remotely: you can quickly start a cycle and stop it at any time.
Try saying: "Alexa, ask Candy simply fi to start wool Cycle" or "Alexa, ask Candy simply fi when does the washing ends?"

Know the best program to use thanks to its “artificial intelligence”: Candy is able to suggest tailored cycles just by providing it simple information like fabrics or clothes, colors and dirt level.
Try saying: "Alexa, ask Candy simply fi how do I clean jeans and t-shirts?"

Ask for hints on how to treat the most difficult stains or how to take care of special fabrics.
Try saying: "Alexa, ask Candy simply fi how to remove chocolate stains"

Know what a specific function does or how you can take care of your washing machine
Try saying: "Alexa, ask Candy simply fi how to clean the filter" or "Alexa, ask Candy simply fi why the door is locked"

5. Gimmicks
Try asking Candy for some strange questions, it will surprise you

Contacts
If you have any questions please contact Candy Support: support@candy-hoover.com
